\draw (3.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (3.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{3}}};
\draw (4.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (4.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{4}}};
\draw (5.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (5.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{5}}};
\draw (6.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (6.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{6}}};
\draw (7.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (7.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{7}}};
\draw (8.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (8.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{8}}};
\draw (9.5,0cm + 2pt) -- (9.5, 0cm -2pt) node[below] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=2]{9}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,0.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,0.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{0}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,0.5    ) -- (0cm-2pt,0.5    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{30}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,1.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,1.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{60}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,1.5    ) -- (0cm-2pt,1.5    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{90}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,2.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,2.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{120}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,2.5    ) -- (0cm-2pt,2.5    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{150}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,3.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,3.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{180}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,3.5    ) -- (0cm-2pt,3.5    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{210}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,4.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,4.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{240}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,4.5    ) -- (0cm-2pt,4.5    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{270}}};
\draw (0cm + 2pt,5.    ) -- (0cm-2pt,5.    ) node[left] {\scriptsize{\num[round-mode=places,round-precision=1]{300}}};
\draw[draw=blue,fill=blue] (0.5,4.5) -- (1.5,4.5);
\node[right,] at (1.5,4.5) {2000 Gauss-rand};
\draw[thick,red] (0.5,4.1) -- (1.5,4.1);
\node[right,] at (1.5,4.1) {Gauss fit};
\draw[thick] (0,0) rectangle (10,5);
\end{tikzpicture}
